    • volatileGroupInstanceId

      public StreamsExecutionOptions.StreamsExecutionOptionsBuilder volatileGroupInstanceId(boolean volatileGroupInstanceId)
      Defines if ConsumerConfig.GROUP_INSTANCE_ID_CONFIG is volatile. If it is configured and non-volatile, KafkaStreams.close(CloseOptions) is called with KafkaStreams.CloseOptions.leaveGroup(boolean) disabled
      Returns:
      this.
